tools.description: Perform a power action on a machine using one of the power types.

power_off_regex.description: Regex to confirm the node is off

power_off_uri.description: URI to power off the node

power_on_regex.description: Regex to confirm the node is on

power_on_uri.description: URI to power on the node

power_query_uri.description: URI to query the nodes power status

power_token.description: Power token, will be used in place of power_user and power_pass

power_verify_ssl.description: Verify SSL connections with system CA certificates
